items.sentence: I sure wish that I could remember what Tom told me.
I suspect Tom and Mary are planning on being there.
Should parents help their kids with their homework?
I\'m glad I\'m not the only one who has to do that.
I think Tom is going to be busy tomorrow afternoon.
I think Tom is the person who painted that picture.
How did you learn that Tom was living in Australia?
I\'ve done everything that Tom told me I had to do.
We need to do something about that before tomorrow.
They say dogs hear better than we do. Is that true?
Tom and Mary need to take a break from one another.
Tom and Mary were best friends when they were kids.
Don\'t you think you could persuade Tom to help us?
Tom attended an international conference in Boston.
The only one who knows where Mary is hiding is Tom.
Tom and Mary like to go dancing with their friends.
You\'re not really planning on doing that, are you?
I wasn\'t the one who told Tom about what happened.
I don\'t think that Tom knows how to read or write.
I don\'t think that Tom knows very much about Mary.
